import styles from './myPage.module.scss' import TopNavBar from 'components/TopNavBar' import { PersonIcon, HeartIcon, CartIcon, TruckIcon, SettingIcon } from 'assets/svgs' import { MouseEvent } from 'react' import { useRecoil } from 'hooks' import { userInfoState } from 'states/userInfo' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const User = () => { const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useRecoil(userInfoState) const navigate = useNavigate() // navigate('/cart') const handleClick = (e: MouseEvent) => { const { value } = e.currentTarget.dataset console.log(e) } return (
{userInfo.userName} ({userInfo.userId})
) } export default User
